org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.operations

Interface MetadataWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumuloMetadataWriter, CassandraMetadataWriter, DynamoDBMetadataWriter, FileSystemMetadataWriter, HBaseMetadataWriter, KuduMetadataWriter, RedisMetadataWriter, RocksDBMetadataWriter

    public interface MetadataWriter
extends AutoCloseable
    Provides an interface for persisting metadata. Writes may only be performed as long as the instance is not closed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flush()
      Flush the writer, committing all pending writes.
      void write(GeoWaveMetadata metadata)
      Write metadata to the table.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(GeoWaveMetadata metadata)
        Write metadata to the table. Preconditions:
        • The writer is not closed
        Parameters:
        metadata - The metadata.

      • flush

        void flush()
        Flush the writer, committing all pending writes. Note that the writes may already be committed - this method just establishes that they *must* be committed after the method returns. Preconditions:
        • The writer is not closed
